channel.title: Server Seed
channel.description:
I downloaded the Minecraft Server, so that I could test my custom framework against the official one. I noticed that there is a property for the world seed, and a question came to mind. If you start a server with one seed, and then shut down the server, change the seed, and start it again, would all future chunks be generated with the new server seed?
EDIT: I tested for myself, and yes, all futures chunks will be generated with the new seed.
A mod can lock this.

item.title: Server Seed
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus

EDIT: I tested for myself, and yes, all futures chunks will be generated with the new seed.
